tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(50),
    regulation_name VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20),
    risk_level VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_monitoring_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id UUID,
    monitoring_date DATE,
    risks_detected BOOLEAN,
    risk_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    entity_id INT NOT NULL,
    area_id INT NOT NULL,
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE regulations (
    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
    regulation_description TEXT,
    agency_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES regulatory_agencies(agency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_measures (
    measure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    measure_name VARCHAR(255),
    measure_description TEXT,
    regulation_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES regulations(regulation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_monitoring (
    monitoring_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    measure_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    monitoring_date DATE,
    monitoring_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (measure_id) REFERENCES compliance_measures(measure_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES risk_categories(category_id)
);
